data.message:
Eminem,
You acting feminine.
Trying to stay relevant
Cause you’re a has been.
Your opinion means shit
When’s the last time you had a hit?
Fuck Trump? Fuck you,
You can’t even come up with something new.
Think you’re the greatest of all time?
Doesn’t take much talent to rhyme.
I mean, you failed the ninth grade
Not once, not twice but three times.
All that bullshit that you spit
About being from the hood in Detroit....
You were raised in Warren or some shit.
Rejected by your dad,
Trying to act all bad,
If making America great makes you mad,
Leave it and make America glad.
Stupid is something you just can’t fix,
Stop sucking so many left wing dicks.
Try something new,
Try it with chicks.
The heart of the matter
Mr. Mathers
Is your display of all that you lack.
Take a look in the mirror my brother,
You ain’t black.....
